markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alchemical Chart](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1970)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 62 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sturdy, rigid alchemical chart contains shorthand references on quickly mixing reagents for maximum effect. If you hold this chart while using [Quick Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=667), the items you create of the listed level remain potent for 1 additional round.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 62 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The chart works for Quick Alchemy items of level 4 or lower.
